listing.listing_description:
The Bungalow is a stylish one-bedroom suite in the heart of Park City, located right on Historic Main Street, within a short walk of Town Lift. Ideal for couples or small families, the apartment blends the vintage alpine charm and contemporary sophistication of this Rocky Mountain capital, providing an ideal home base for ski vacations, summer golf getaways, or pilgrimages to the Sundance Film Festival.

After a day on the mountain or an evening on the town, the open-plan living area provides lovely setting for sharing downtime with loved-ones. The designer kitchen is fully equipped with Viking and Subzero appliances and includes a breakfast bar for four, while the lounge area features sumptuous furnishings, a Sonos Sound System, and a large, mounted Apple TV. The décor features rustic wood paneling, floors, and ceiling beams and exquisite modernist touches in the light fixtures and hearth. Heating, air conditioning, and a washer/dryer ensure comfort and convenience for all guests.

The Bungalow's bedroom features a king bed, walk-in closet, TV, and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower and tub. There is also a queen-size sofa bed in the living room. The rich wood paneling evokes an idyllic alpine cabin, while comfortable bedding and high-end bathroom fixtures inspire refreshing repose before your next adventure.

An elevator leads to the building's lobby, from which the many splendors of Park City unfurl before you. Park Silly Sunday Market is right next door, and Town Lift Plaza is a short walk down Main Street. Skiers can also take a five-minute drive by car or shuttle to the Park City or Deer Valley bases, while golfers are just ten minutes from Park City Golf Course. Public parking is available under the Marriot Hotel (guests are reimbursed for parking costs), and the Park City Transit center is steps away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Cloud Cabin is a beautiful contemporary villa in Breckenridge. Located at the top of White Cloud Drive less than two miles from BreckExpress Lift, the four-bedroom villa features exquisite mountain-modern design, luxurious indoor and outdoor spaces for relaxation and entertainment, and expansive views of Ten Mile Range and the Breckenridge slopes.

The villa's design gives a contemporary interpretation of classic mountain-lodge charm. The interior's main floor features a capacious Great Room illuminated by two-story mountain-view windows. In the sumptuous lounge, the sectional and armchairs of supple leather face the central hearth with fireplace and mounted flat screen TV, perfect for relaxing with family and friends. The kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade Thermador appliances and an island breakfast bar, while the elegant dining table for eight is ideal for epic feasts. Woven bamboo flooring, exposed wooden beams, and lovely furnishings create an exquisite alpine ambience. Downstairs, the villa's ground floor includes a dozy media room with smart TV.

Outside the Great Room, the wrap-around deck features a barbeque grill and outdoor furniture for alfresco dining and relaxation in the mountain air. On the downstairs patio, a hot tub invites you to a delicious soak beneath the towering pines.

The villa's four deluxe bedrooms sleep ten. The spacious master suite features a king size bed, fireplace, and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and bath. The first guest room has a queen bed and ensuite bathroom, and opens directly to the patio with hot tub. The other two guestrooms share a hallway bathroom; ne has a queen size bed, while the other has two twins—perfect for kids.

Cloud Cabin's location gives you a wonderful balance of secluded privacy and easy access to Breckenridge. The villa is right in Warrior's Mark near Peak 9 and 10, with excellent cross-country skiing and snowshoeing options and access to the Burro Trail for advanced skiers. BreckConnect Gondola is about two miles away, while a little farther on is the Gondola to Peak 8. Copper Mountain is twenty miles away. Kids will love sledding and tubing at Carter Park, while Golfers are in easy reach of Breckenridge Golf Club, six miles away. For evenings on the town, Main Street in Breckenridge is just minutes from your door.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Make the views from Sunset Cliffs your own at Villa Bermuda Beach. This stunning spot is known for its surf break and sunsets, and makes an incredible setting for a relaxed getaway or destination wedding—or the honeymoon after. The villa showcases the postcard-worthy panorama in nearly every room, and can accommodate up to six friends and family members in its three bedrooms.

This luxury property opens to a deck built right on the rocky cliffs that features sunny lounging areas, an umbrella-shaded dining table, a barbecue and a private oceanfront hot tub. Rinse off in the al-fresco shower before heading inside to relax in front of the cable TV or share photos of your holiday via Wi-Fi.

Inside Villa Bermuda Beach, the seaside location shows up in yacht-style wood paneling, beach-inspired artwork and, of course, the wall of nearly floor-to-ceiling windows and doors that opens the great room to the front deck (plus a second courtyard-style deck tucked away from the ocean). Take a seat on the sofa and chairs in front of the fireplace and TV or at the breakfast bar, or whip up a meal from fresh California produce in the fully equipped kitchen.

This vacation rental boasts three bedrooms with king beds: one master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, and two bedrooms that share a bathroom. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms are bright, beachy and modern, with warm wood paneling, serene neutral bedding and the occasional pop of color in a playful area rug.

With Bermuda Beach less than five minutes away and Ocean Beach with its cafés and shops just over 1 mile away, you may not want to leave the Beaches neighborhood during your stay. But a short drive into central San Diego of less than 10 miles will bring you to attractions like the charming Gaslamp Quarter, the well-preserved Old Town historic park and even the San Diego Zoo.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Skyfall is a stunning example of 1960’s architecture that transcends its era to remain a timeless beacon of luxury. Located in the rugged foothills of the San Jacinto Mountains, in a quiet corner of South Palm Springs, you’ll be treated inspiring mountain and valley views. The villa’s aesthetic is worthy of a James Bond movie and at any moment you’ll expect 007 himself to come striding out.

The villa wraps the spacious circular terrace where water from an elevated hot tub cascades down into the pool. The terrace is complete with everything you need to enjoy blissful days under the sun: chaise lounges, a couch and vintage Eero Aarnio fiberglass chairs. During summer months you can cool off in the home’s outdoor misting system, while a circular overhang and freestanding parasols offer relief from the desert heat.

The home’s rounded interior complements the pool terrace and boasts sleek, clean lines and modern décor. The great room’s signature floor-to-ceiling windows look out over the pool and beyond to the lights of Palm Springs. Vibrant upholstery and art add flashes of color throughout the home, including the cozy turquoise sofas where you can unwind and chat with guests. You’ll love preparing feasts in the gourmet kitchen. Fully-equipped and featuring an impressive double-oven, the kitchen is anchored around a large center island. Meals can be savored in the formal dining room or poolside at an al fresco table.

The large Master suite is found at the North end of the home. It features a King size bed, sectional sofa, flatscreen television and access to a semi-private terrace. Its spa-like en-suite houses a walk-in shower, dual vanities and a beautiful Eero Aarnio Ball Chair. The second Master suite is at the home’s South end. It also contains a King size bed and private en-suite, as well as direct access to the pool terrace. The remaining bedroom is a Queen suite with a private patio. It has access to a well-appointed hallway bathroom.

Palm Springs is the perfect destination for those seeking either outdoor adventure or rest and relaxation. The villa is just minutes from downtown, where you’ll find upscale shops, restaurants, spas and nightlife. The Coachella Valley is a golfer’s dream, as it’s home to over 80 courses, amid breathtaking scenery. Hikers of all levels will enjoy trails in the surrounding hills and national parks.

Palm Springs Registered Tax Number: 3031

Palm Springs City ID: 2598

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Modern Oasis is a stunning example of the mid-century modern design that turned a once sleepy town into the desert playground of the rich and famous. The spacious three-bedroom home is located in the much-coveted Las Palmas neighborhood and has been thoughtfully reinterpreted to meet the high standards of today’s discerning guests. The home’s sharp angles and its tall, verdant privacy hedges stand out against a rugged backdrop of the San Jacinto Mountains.

Stellar indoor and outdoor amenities are seamlessly integrated and compete for your attention. Verdant grass connects the many conversation areas around the pool terrace. A long covered patio shelters an al fresco dining table and living room set. Cool off with a dip in the pool before laying in a hammock or chaise longue to resume work on your tan. A custom wet bar and barbecue provide a cozy venue for preparing a holiday feast. As dusk settles, head for the bubbling grotto spa which fits up to twelve people.

Enter the home through any of the floor-to-ceiling sliding glass door and you’ll encounter spacious, bright rooms with cool, natural stone floors and exposed wood beam ceilings. A lively minimalist-chic aesthetic is applied in the great room. The living room is anchored by a stacked stone fire place. Enjoy films and premium cable on the flatscreen television while you relax on a modern sectional sofa. Perfect your culinary skills in the gourmet kitchen as you prepare memorable meals on high-end appliances. Guests can watch you work from the breakfast bar before dinner is served in the formal dining room.

The Master suite is found in a tranquil corner of the villa. It houses a California King size bed, entertainment unit and a well-appointed en-suite spa. The Master suite also leads out to a private patio with an in-ground spa; perfect for moonlight soaks. The second and third bedrooms are also large and well lit. They feature ample closet space and share a bathroom with a combination shower/soak tub.

Palm Springs is the perfect destination for those seeking outdoor adventure or rest and relaxation. The villa is just blocks from downtown, where you’ll find upscale shops, restaurants and nightlife. The Coachella Valley is a golfer’s dream, as it’s home to over 80 courses, amid breathtaking scenery. Hikers of all levels will enjoy trails in the surrounding hills and national parks.

Palm Springs Registered Tax Number: 3031

Palm Springs City ID: 1495

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Turn your ski holiday to best advantage at the beautifully appointed, conveniently located Vickery's Vantage. This sleek five-bedroom Highlands home boasts a spacious open-concept layout with incredible mountain views, all in a setting only 10 minutes from downtown Breckenridge and a short drive from the gondola. Invite up to sixteen guests for a mountain getaway with friends or a relaxed break with extended family.

In warmer weather, savor the views from expansive outdoor living areas with a barbecue, firepit and a honeymoon-worthy hot tub under the stars. If you've been out on the slopes, leave gear in the mud room, stretch out in the exercise room, test your skill at the pool table or unwind in the media room with refreshments from the wet bar. Other entertainment options include a Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi.

A mix of large open-plan spaces and quieter nooks makes it easy to gather as a group or steal a moment for a nap in this luxury home. The heart of Vickery's Vantage is a stunning great room with vaulted ceilings and panoramic views of the Colorado landscape, where you can cozy up to a wood-burning fireplace in the sitting area, turn out a gourmet meal in the fully equipped kitchen and seat twelve around the dining table.

The villa has two bedrooms with king beds and private en-suite bathrooms, two bedrooms with queen beds and shared access to a hall bathroom, and one bedroom with an extra-large twin bunk bed plus two twin-over-queen bunk beds-the perfect place for kids to giggle themselves to sleep. The bunk room also has shared access to a hall bathroom.

With a location in the exclusive Highlands community, this vacation rental puts you about 10 minutes from the BreckConnect gondola and the shops and restaurants in downtown Breckenridge. For more choice in runs, make the short drive to the Breckenridge Ski Resort base or Copper Mountain Ski Resort; for an afternoon off from skiing, head to Carter Park and go sledding or tubing instead.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This superb townhome is located at 205 Main Street, an exclusive luxury condo development ideally situated in the heart of Park City, a short walk from Town Lift. The stylish yet cozy vacation rental blends classic alpine elements with sophisticated contemporary design, including a gourmet kitchen, outdoor hot tub, and gorgeous artwork and fixtures. Three bedrooms including a kid-friendly bunkroom form an ideal home base for family mountain vacations in this jewel of the Rockies.

The open-plan interior features a spacious salon with a sumptuous sofa facing a stone fireplace. Kindle a fire in the evening and sip hot cocoa or red wine while recounting the day's adventures, and step onto the balcony for a soothing soak in the alfresco spa. Prepare hearty meals in the chef-grade kitchen, relish them around the dining table for eight, and cuddle up in the media room with your favorite shows and films. The villa's exquisite décor blends rustic wood accents, luminous white finishes, and exquisite artwork that harmonizes modernist style with indigenous patterns, evoking both the timeless traditions and cutting-edge culture of Park City.

All three bedroom suites feature air conditioning and ensuite bathrooms, two with jetted tubs. The master suite includes a king bed, walk-in closet, and sitting area, while the primary guest suite includes a queen bed and private balcony. The charming bunk room offers two twin-size beds (sleeping four in all).

With its balance of serenity and convenience, there is hardly a finer location in Park City than 205 Main Street. You can easily walk to Town Lift Plaza to access the extraordinary slopes and trails of Park City Mountain Resort, or drive about five minutes to the resort base (the vacation rental includes two underground parking spots). Deer Valley and Park City Golf Course are also a short drive away, while the heart of Historic Main Street is just steps down the road.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Take a quintessential Colorado ski holiday with a modern twist at Pop Art Villa. This ski-in, ski-out luxury property offers unparalleled access to the slopes from its setting in the exclusive Arrabelle at Vail Square, while its spacious interiors and sophisticated style make it a welcoming retreat after a day out in the mountains.

Guests of the villa are welcome to use the shared rooftop lap pools and hot tubs, children’s room, fitness center and seasonal outdoor firepits at the Arrabelle at Vail Square. Pop Art also has its own underground parking spot, a furnished private balcony with a barbecue and entertainment options including a TV, Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi.

This beautifully appointed vacation rental is laid out around an open-concept great room. Set a beverage on the oversized coffee table and settle into the sofa and chairs by the gas fireplace, catch up with friends and family around the dining table, or perch at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen for a quick coffee or drink. Throughout the residence, subtle neutral tones and luxe textures are set off by the vibrant art collection for which the home is named.

Pop Art Villa has three bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, including a master bedroom with borrowed-from-a-honeymoon-suite features such as a jetted bathtub. Like the great room, the bedrooms are furnished in refined contemporary style for a relaxed—and relaxing–vibe.

A Vail Valley location puts you in the heart of the action. The villa is less than a 5-minute walk from Lionshead Village, the Born Free express lift and the Eagle Bahn gondola, and less than a 10-minute drive from Vail Village. (There’s also a shuttle available from the Arrabelle to Vail Village.) If you’re visiting outside of ski season, you’ll find several golf courses and the Betty Ford Alpine Gardens just a short drive away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Ideal for family vacations and groups of friends, Sunrise Ski Haus is a modern 4-bedroom mountain home pocketed away in Christie Heights, one of Breckenridge’s premier neighborhoods. The Breckenridge Connect Gondola is under a mile from the villa and will whisk you away to Peaks 7 and 8 or down to the Main Street where you’ll discover a rich selection of restaurants, bars, shops and local festivities.

Sunrise Ski Haus has been built to take full advantage of its elevated position and alpine setting. Natural wood, stone and marble blend seamlessly into the forested surroundings and large picture windows and vaulted ceilings accentuate the magnificent views over Baldy Mountain and Breckenridge Town. Like the pine-scented air, the décor is clean and fresh and families with teenagers and adult children will appreciate the split-level living areas.

An impressive ground floor living space is at the heart of this welcoming home and adjoins the granite-topped professional kitchen with its 4-burner stove and griddle. The open-plan ground floor is a great spot for mingling, discussing the day’s adventures over dinner around the 10-seater dining table or stretching out on the leather sofa with your iPad or the latest bestseller. In the evenings your party might like to gather around the fire and watch a movie here on the flat-screen television or head downstairs to the more private living room which enjoys its own extra-large television screen, wet bar and feature fireplace. An outdoor patio with private hot tub, fire pit and gas grill is the perfect spot for unwinding after a day spent hiking or skiing in the mountains.

Fresh air tends to make you sleepy and you’ll be grateful that there are plenty of comfortable bedrooms at Sunrise. Plush king-size beds are ready to settle you into a deep slumber in the Master bedrooms on the main and lower levels and both rooms are served by deluxe en-suite bathrooms. Bedroom One is resplendent with a stand-alone tub and shower, while Bedroom Two has a shower and access to the patio. There’s a queen and twin bed in the third bedroom and a bathroom shared with Bedroom Four which is great for kids with its two twin bunk beds. All rooms have televisions.

Ski slopes surround you in this neck of the woods, and you are less than a mile from access to them, but if you prefer to explore the area by car there’s a 2-car garage within the property. The nearest airports are Leadville (45 miles) and Denver International (105 miles).

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Bedroom 4 - Additional bedding: 2 Twin bunk beds, Shared bathroom with Bedroom 3, Television

listing.listing_description:
Located in the heart of one of the most desirable neighborhoods in Breckenridge is Highwoods at Shockhill. Part of the Shock Hill Landing development, luxury, comfort and convenience will draw you to this exceptional, newly constructed property. Warmer months provide stellar golf and hiking opportunities in Colorado, while the winters bring skis, snowboards and rosy cheeks. Keep on the lookout for lovely birds or the fleeting glimpse of a fox darting into the woods as you navigate the incredible natural scenery around you!

The spacious open layout of the main floor is the perfect place to entertain or just relax and watch television, read a book or listen to music on the surround sound system. The incredible views from the deck invite you to take it easy on the patio chairs or fire up some steaks on the gas grill. After the day’s activities, entertainment for children can be found in the den with games to play or movies to watch from the 200+ film library. Step onto the patio and sit under the stars while you soak in the hot tub or warm up around the fire pit.

Built with native natural accents, reclaimed wood floors and high end amenities, this private vacation rental provides everything you need for a wonderful alpine holiday. The fully-stocked gourmet kitchen features stainless steel appliances, granite countertops and an eat-in counter. High ceilings and huge windows allow much natural sunlight to enter the home throughout the day.

Four exquisite bedrooms and some additional bedding accommodate up to twelve guests at this holiday chalet. With a master king suite, two king bedroom suites, a bunk bedroom and a sleeper sofa, there is something for everyone in your group. Highwoods at Shockhill makes a great bet for a family vacation or an unforgettable alpine honeymoon.

Only steps from the Gondola Mid-Station, guests will have quick access to the ski slopes as well as the dining, shopping and nightlife of Main Street. If it is Nordic skiing or hiking you desire, endless trails are right outside your front door. In the fall, the Breckenridge Oktoberfest sprawls into Main Street and welcomes live music, dancing and food for a cultural experience during your stay. Get the mountain sojourn you have earned with Luxury Retreats!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Bedroom 3: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower

listing.listing_description:
This charming lakeside villa offers great access to Florida’s finest theme parks, as well as supreme interior style and comfort. Adults will appreciate the tasteful styling, expansive living spaces and poolside shade, while kids will love the playful bedroom set-up, plus large, well-equipped games room. Universal Studios and Disney World are a short drive, with fine dining and spas close by.

Pulling into the driveway of Loxahatchee Palms, guests will enter a home lit by a welcoming fireplace and glowing lamps inside expressive metal frames. Loxahatchee Palms offers completely modern surrounds, including a shaded pool promising morning refreshment, complete with comfy sun recliners. Huge, spacious bathrooms and thoughtfully-outfitted royal bedrooms offer the next level of hospitality, while kids will love drifting off in fun, inventive sleeping quarters decorated with bright decor. Extra entertainment is assured via the colorful playroom and private home theater - ideal for winding down after an active day. 

Guests are just a short drive from some of the country’s finest theme parks with a stay at Loxahatchee Palms. The famous rides, sights and unforgettable memories of Disney World and Universal Studios are just a short car ride away, while plus a myriad of spas, restaurants and attractions. Downtown Orlando is similarly close by, while guests can easily take things down a gear with a memorable visit to a local wildlife park or nature reserve. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Spot the sea from nearly every room at Family Tides. This La Jolla vacation rental is ideally located, close to several top attractions in the San Diego area, and thoughtfully designed, with sunset views and 4,300 square feet of living space. Its four bedrooms can welcome four couples on a beach getaway or a group of friends living out a California dream.

This luxury property has both a front terrace where you can watch the waves with a cup of coffee or watch the sunset with a cocktail in hand, and a private back terrace where you can lounge by the pool and hot tub or sit down at the al-fresco dining table. After sunset, cozy up to the indoor fireplace and look to the TV and Wi-Fi for entertainment.

Warm wood floors, crisp white walls and an open-concept layout tie the living spaces at Family Tides together. There are two sitting areas anchored by a fireplace and TV, a nautical-inspired dining area with ocean views and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar and its own views of the water.

All four bedrooms at the villa have king beds and en-suite bathrooms, and three of them open directly to the terrace. Details like four-poster beds and vibrant textiles give each bedroom plenty of personality, and in the bathrooms, abundant marble lends a spa-like feel. The bedrooms can accommodate groups of up to twelve on holiday together.

Family Tides is less than a 10-mile drive from some of the area’s best landmarks and attractions, from Mt. Soledad and the San Diego-La Jolla Underwater Park to the Torrey Pines Golf Course. Find one-of-a-kind items in the boutiques of Old Town San Diego, or sit down to a honeymoon-worthy dinner in a restaurant in this charmingly quaint neighborhood.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Sitting just a block away from Main Street, this contemporary villa in Park City is a cozy retreat for ski getaways and is one of our top Utah vacation rentals. Park City is considered one of North America’s top alpine ski resorts and is a frequent host of international ski competitions.

After a day on the slopes, head back for a soak under the stars in the outdoor hot tub. Once you’ve dried off, relax with a movie in the theater room; it features a comfy L-shaped sofa and a large projector screen. This villa also boasts a heated one-car garage, included WiFi and during winter season there’s a daily complimentary towel and amenity service.

This newly constructed, 2,350-square-foot home exudes an inviting, open-concept space. The living room is done in soft grey and white tones with silver accent pieces and stylish furnishings surrounding a gas fireplace. Meanwhile, natural light pours in through multiple windows, the skylight and glass doors that open up to a balcony. Nearby, the kitchen is equally bright and comes fully equipped with modern appliances and a center island with a breakfast bar.

There are three individually decorated bedrooms in this home. The master suite has a king size bed as well as a sitting area next to a fireplace with a flatscreen television and access to a patio. A second room includes two twin beds, while a third offers a double size bed.

You’ll be conveniently close to the town ski lift at Park City Mountain Resort—just a five minute walk. This home is also located close to Main Street where you’ll find diverse shopping, dining and nightlife options.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Entertain family and friends in style in the balmy California weather at Clubhouse. This beautifully appointed vacation rental has an array of luxury amenities, more than 3,000 square feet of space and four bedrooms, divided between a main house and a casita. Its Indio location means it's only minutes to several golf courses, the Coachella festival grounds, Indian Wells and more.

Clubhouse feels like your own private resort thanks to outdoor living areas with a pool, hot tub, putting green, a kitchenette with a barbecue and wine cooler, a firepit and fireplace, plus spaces for lounging, sitting and dining. The amenities continue inside, where you'll find a satellite TV, pool table and Wi-Fi.

The villa's newly remodeled interiors pair mid-century influences with a contemporary open-concept layout. Catch up on the sleek gray velour sectional in the sitting area, perch on a robin's egg blue stool at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped gourmet kitchen, or gather everyone around the clean-lined dining table in wishbone-style chairs.

The main house at Clubhouse features a master bedroom with a king bed and en-suite bathrooms, as well as two bedrooms with a queen bed and two twin beds, respectively, that share a bathroom. With its queen bed, en-suite bathroom, living area and kitchenette, the casita could be used as a honeymoon-style escape or a quiet retreat for in-laws.

Whether you've come to the Desert Cities for a festival, sporting event or just a holiday in the sun, you're close to the action at Clubhouse. From the villa's location in a gated community, it's a 10-minute drive or less to three different golf courses, the Coachella festival grounds, the tennis at Indian Wells and downtown Indio. For a day trip, drive to Joshua Tree National Park for a look at the otherworldly landscape or downtown Palm Springs to discover its mid-century architectural gems.

City ID # 20-00019908

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Welcome to five-star living at Cawha Chalet! With custom craftsmanship, you’ll be dazzled upon entrance. Breckenridge started as a mining town and is now a popular ski resort in Summit County. Part of the Rocky Mountains, the area provides some great opportunities for winter sports enthusiasts and, with lovely summertime activities, also makes a great destination for a family holiday year round.

This home has everything you could want to make your stay unforgettable. After a day on the slopes, you can saunter back to your chalet, where you can relax and unwind in the private outdoor hot tub with amazing views. For the athletes in the group, Cawha Chalet also features a exercise room with a small flat screen television! The main living space boasts a gorgeous living area with high ceilings, a beautiful stone gas fireplace, hardwood floors, a flat screen television and elegant furnishings.

Douglas Fir beams throughout the home give it an elegant, rustic feel. The gourmet kitchen is any chef’s dream with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances, and there is even a breakfast bar! Not in the mood to cook? Then grill something succulent on the outdoor gas barbeque. The dining area, where there is room for twelve, is surrounded by windows showcasing the mountainous views for you and all your guests to marvel.

For privacy and space, Cawha Chalet comes equipped with an individual bathroom for each bedroom. This high-end home can sleep up to thirteen guests with three kings, two twins, one bunk bed and one captain’s bunk (twin over double). To relax after a long day on the slopes, indulge in the fabulous king-sized bed in the master suite and soothe your tired muscles in the two-person shower or jet tub.

With all sorts of mountain activities including skiing, snowboarding, snowshoeing, hiking, and many more, your adventure options are endless year-round. Walking distance from the Snowflake Lift and 4 O’clock Ski Run, you’re only steps away from perhaps the best skiing in the world. The Cawha Chalet is a beautiful luxury home that is a must-see and a must-book! Whether you are bringing the family, coming for a work retreat or just enjoying the lap of luxury with friends, this Colorado chalet is sure to provide the dream mountain holiday you always wanted.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The city version of a traditional ski lodge, this downtown villa has all the mountain-style, and it’s walking distance to Park City’s Main Street. Size-up the ski slopes from the living room’s cozy leather sofa while you finish your espresso. Then, grab your gear from the ski storage area and head out. On your way, stop in to check out the latest gear at the boutique shops lining Main Street.

Treasure Hollow’s trendy townhouse-layout gives each space a unique vibe and flow. The expertly organized kitchen and breakfast bar make tremendous use of their small space. From there, the dining area and double-sided fireplace lead the way to the living room, where the flat-screen TV sits above the mantle. And, the second living room downstairs is the perfect place for the kids to hang out.

The Sunday Market in Park City is a great place to pick up some local produce and organic meat for the barbecue. After you’ve eaten, mix up a few festive cocktails at the wet bar gather in the living room to enjoy the view while you catch up with old friends. Later, move the party outside to the hot tub. In the warmer months, outdoor furniture adds another space to gather. And, the villa comes with 2 parking spots.

With Main Street and the Sunday Market both within walking distance, you’ll have everything you need nearby. When it’s time to hit the slopes, Park City, Deer Valley, and Canyons Village are all with 5 miles of home. If there’s a golfer in the group, Park City Golf Course offers challenging fairways and dynamic landscapes, especially for those who haven’t been mountain-golfing yet.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The exclusive Beverly Hills 90210 zip code is one that needs no introduction and it is there, among the homes Hollywood’s elite, that you’ll find L.A. Villa. The stylish four-bedroom house was built by a renowned French architect and overflows with all the amenities you could want for a relaxing stay surrounded by the finer things in life.

The pool terrace feels like your own private oasis as lush green gardens scale the walls, majestic palms tower upwards and decorative curtains billow in the breeze. In the corner a Grecian fountain brings calm to your surroundings as you recline on cushioned deck furniture and enjoy the California sun. An al fresco dining area provides the perfect spot for a delicious meal under the stars. Technology flows subtly through the villa, with a central audio system reaching all main areas, fast Wi-Fi connectivity and a phone system offering free long-distance calls.

Inside, hand-picked Italian furniture and African antiques adorn the spacious open-concept main room, and are lit up by sunlight pouring in through a retractable glass wall. There you’ll find two living areas, back-to-back: one facing a beautiful fireplace and the other orientated towards a large flatscreen television. The gourmet kitchen also adds to the home’s cutting edge feel, with high-end appliances and smooth, stone countertops that make cooking a pleasure. Meals can be enjoyed around the picturesque dining room table that seats six or a charming breakfast table.

Each of L.A. Villa’s bedrooms feature an en-suite bathroom with premium fixtures, plus air conditioning, hair dryer, entertainment system and phone. The Master and second bedrooms house spa-quality bathrooms with designer bathtubs and walk-in showers. The fourth bedroom is located in a lovely guest house with its own living room. Housekeeping service is available five days a week.

When you’re ready to explore, you’ll find the best of Beverly Hills all less than ten minutes away, including the upscaled shops and restaurants of Rodeo Drive. There’s also golf, tennis courts and grocery stores nearby. In less than half an hour you can get to many of the city’s top attractions like Hollywood and downtown L.A. Beach lovers can head West for 35 minutes to Santa Monica or up the coast to Malibu.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Registration number: HSR19-001803

listing.listing_description:
Live it up in the heart of the metropolis with a stay in this artistic and fashionable penthouse. Nestled amongst towering skyscrapers, take advantage of great access to the entertainment district, before returning in style to huge living spaces, tall columns, sunny roof terrace and a sublime pool. Downtown, LA Live, the Convention Centre, and the Staples Center are just a short walk away.

Entering this opulent surrounds of Sky Penthouse, the first thing that strikes guests is the huge 17 foot windows that provide an incredible view of the city streets below. The second aspect will be the sheer luxury and sense of space in the penthouse, with vertical columns increasing the size feel, while fine furniture, spotless kitchen and reclining area all occupy the central section. Relax over breakfast on the shaded and quiet terrace, before moving to the second outdoor area, the sunny pool patio which offers sweet refreshment from the California heat. An impressive outdoor seating area is at your disposal, complete with host-with-the-most barbecue, plus a touch of rustic charm via the outdoor firepit. Explore the complex’s other fine amenities, and make the most of the supplied spa, plus that LA must-have; a fully-equipped exercise center.

Guests could not ask for a better location when it comes to staying in LA proper. For business trips, the LA Convention Centre, as well as that commercial hub, LA Live, are less than 10-minute walk away. Plunge into the major cultural institutions, such as the LA County Museum of Art. This highly central location ensures you can visit all the best aspects of this global city via short drive, from the famous beaches and sunny climes of Santa Monica, to the strips and landmarks of Hollywood, Sky Penthouse provides the perfect balance of both location and next-level comfort.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Champagne Dream is a stunning four-bedroom villa that seamlessly blends the mid-century Palm Springs aesthetic with crisp, modern lines. Hidden in the historic Deepwell area, a quick tour around this central neighborhood will reveal glamour and style which drew Hollywood’s elite to the desert.

Palm Springs design is known for blurring the lines between indoor and outdoor living, and the property’s immense pool terrace is a prime example. Activities and amenities are anchored around a sleek saline pool and bubbling spa. Bronze yourself to perfection on a reclining chaise longue before seeking shelter under covered areas on the north side of the pool. A cabana shelters an al fresco dining table, where you can savor feasts prepared on the gas grill. A stylish lounge set sits at the other end, allowing you and your guests to enjoy cocktails mixed at the nearby wet bar, as flames flicker from an elevated fire pit.

Cool porcelain tiles line the great room’s spacious common areas. Each section features a pocket glass door leading outside. Exposed beam ceilings and a stacked stone fireplace pay homage to the villa’s modernist origins. The two-sided fireplace casts a warming glow towards anyone relaxing on the living room sofas or watching a movie in the media room. Test your culinary skills in the gourmet kitchen where you’ll find a high-end cooktop and a unique appliance garage, keeping smaller machines discretely hidden. Up to eight people can gather at the regency dining table, where faux-stag busts hold court at either end.

Champagne Dream’s four beautifully-appointed bedrooms are bright, airy and tastefully decorated. They are all air conditioned, boast king size beds and open onto the patio. The large Master bedroom has a stunning en-suite bathroom with premium fixtures, dual vanities and walk-in shower. The recently constructed casita shares a wall with the rest of the house, but is only accessible by its patio entrance, making it a perfectly private miniature residence for teenagers.

When you’re ready to explore, it’s just a five minute drive to historic Palm Canyon Drive, known as, “the strip”. There you’ll find an eclectic mix of shops, restaurants, cafés and art galleries, including incredible treasure troves of mid-century modern antiques. You can also relax at some of the world’s best spas, including Rancho Las Palmas and La Quinta. Golfers have over 80 lush courses to choose from in the Coachella Valley.

Palm Springs Registered Tax Number: 3031

Palm Springs City ID: 3850

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Kir Royale takes its cue from the mid-century modern architecture that dots the landscape of Palm Springs’, Vista Las Palmas neighborhood. This elegant villa rises from the foothills of Mount San Jacinto to reveal its unique design and seamless indoor/outdoor living spaces to the world. Let this spacious, four-bedroom home be your desert oasis.

The villa features top-shelf amenities that will make your stay unforgettable. Savor the tranquil ambiance around the pool as you sun yourself on a designer chaise longue or daybed. You’ll also find a tanning shelf, to ensure an even California tan. Cool off with a dip in the pool, or under the refreshing spray of a misting system. At night you can walk up to the elevated spa and relax under the stars or host a gathering by the glow of a gas firepit. The open-air living room will allow you to maximize your outdoor experience. It houses comfortable seating, and kitchenette with barbecue.

The interior blends modern and Regency-style décor to perfection, creating an atmosphere of vintage luxury. A spiral staircase with walnut steps anchors the home. Terrazzo floors lead you from room to room where you’ll discover plush sofas, subtly installed electronics, fireplaces housed in custom walls and designer lamps and chandeliers. The gourmet kitchen features Boffi fixtures and high-end appliances, making cooking a pleasure. Contemplate the desert-view from the yoga and meditation room.

The Master bedroom occupies the upper lever and opens onto a private deck, with exterior stairs leading down to the pool terrace. Its well-appointed en-suite holds a spa-shower and free-standing tub. The second and third bedrooms are on the ground floor, each with a Queen bed, en-suite and access to the pool. The remaining room is in a charming, self-contained casita with a private patio, kitchenette and en-suite.

You won’t have to look far for activities in Palm Springs. Start with a stroll around Vista Las Palmas and the Movie Colony neighborhoods and experience mid-century homes that drew Hollywood’s elite to the desert. The Coachella Valley is home to over 80 golf courses set against breathtaking backdrops. You’ll also find national parks with hikes for all skill levels. Shop and dine at the eclectic shops and restaurants along Palm Canyon Drive.

Palm Springs Registered Tax Number: 3031

Palm Springs City ID: 202

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Rushing water and classic Colorado scenery are the backdrop to a relaxed ski holiday at River Song at the Shores. Look out at valley views from this contemporary Breckenridge vacation rental—and walk to a shuttle stop, recreation trail and private access to a ski run. Three bedrooms have room for nine friends and family out for mountain fun together.

Listen to the river running past from a private patio with a barbecue, firepit, hot tub and, in the summer, an al-fresco dining area. If you’ve spent the day on the slopes, cozy up with the help of the media room, gas fireplace, wine fridge, cable TV and Wi-Fi, or prep gear for the next day’s adventures with the help of the laundry facilities.

Natural textures and bright, airy spaces give the villa an ambience of inviting mountain luxury. Stone and wood lend warmth to the open-concept great room, while oversized windows and vaulted ceilings bring in plenty of light. The L-shaped space features a sitting area, a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar and a dining area for eight.

Each of the three bedrooms at River Song has a king bed. Two of the bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and TVs, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with its own gas fireplace, and the third bedroom shares access to a hall bathroom.

River Song is a 4-minute walk from the 4 O’Clock ski run, which guests can enter via private access, and a 5-minute walk from the Summit Stage shuttle bus service, which puts the best of Breckenridge within easy reach. It’s also easy to access the Breckenridge-to-Dillon recreation trail from the entrance to The Shores community. If you’re driving, it’s only 3 miles to the shops, restaurants and activities in charming downtown Breckenridge.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
A watchful zebra is a note of wildness in the otherwise-refined rooms of this modern estate 20 minutes west of downtown Austin. Leather sofas, vintage rugs, and patterned tile feel contemporary-chic downstairs, and a sweeping staircase leads to bedrooms upstairs. Look out over Texas hills from the back of a swan float in the pool and drive 12 miles for a swim in the 3-acre Barton Springs Pool.

Watch the sun move across the trees from hillside living areas with a swimming pool, loungers, and an outdoor kitchen with a barbecue. As the lights switch on in the city below, heat up the grill for dinner or go inside to sip drinks from the bar, watch the cable TV, play impromptu tournaments on the pool and shuffleboard tables, and share holiday photos via Wi-Fi.

Cool tones of gray, charcoal, and white, along with high ceilings, give the living areas an airy feel, while details like hardwood floors and leather sofas add balancing touches of warmth. The formal living and dining rooms are open to each other, and there’s a separate open-concept family room and fully equipped kitchen, including a breakfast bar.

This vacation rental has 4 bedrooms with king beds; 3 have ensuite bathrooms, including a master bedroom with a honeymoon-suite-worthy jetted tub and its own private lounge area and balcony. The fourth bedroom shares a Jack-and-Jill-style bathroom with bedroom 5, which has a queen bed. A spare room with a double size bed and two bunk beds can accommodate those extra guests.

From the quiet hilltop setting of this luxury property, it’s less than 10 miles to the nearest golf course and less than 15 miles to Zilker Metropolitan Park, whose nearly 400 acres are studded with paddler-friendly Lady Bird Lake and local-favorite Barton Springs Pool. Drive 15 miles to downtown Austin for a free tour of the Texas State Capitol building and a night out sampling the town’s restaurants, bars, and live-music venues.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Escape to the wilderness of the Spanish Peaks at this scenic ski lodge in Big Sky, Montana. Gaze upon the imposing views of Lone Peak from the comfort of a plush leather sofa. Let the Fan Mountian range inspire you while rejuvenating in the hot tub. And, warm up by the wood-burning fire after a day on the slopes. Later, drive 7 miles to Big Sky’s town center for a steak dinner at Horn and Cantle.

Decorated with towering evergreens, exposed wood, and natural stone, Hoos View encapsulates the rugged essence of Montana. The kitchen’s breakfast bar is the perfect place to sip coffee and plan out an exciting day. When you get home, throw your wet gear in the ski storage room, and make sure to use the boot warmers. Then gather in the great room to tell tales over a hot chocolate or something from the wet bar.

On quiet nights in, throw the big game on the satellite, catch a flick with the family, or organize a shuffleboard tournament. In the warmer months, skip the steakhouse and pick up your own cuts from the local butcher for a backyard barbecue. Enjoy your meal amongst the mountain views at the alfresco set. Later, get a fire going in the fire pit and gather around for some smores.

With ski access just 5 minutes from home, you’ll be able to carve the slopes of Big Sky bright and early each morning. In the summer, golf in Montana is an incredibly scenic way to take in the landscapes. After your round, stop into the Moonlight Basin Clubhouse for lunch. Then, head into town to try out some craft beers at Lone Peak Taproom or Beehive Basin Brewery.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Spend your ski holiday in one of the most coveted neighborhoods in Breckenridge at Highlands Hideaway. This spacious five-bedroom home occupies a tree-lined lot in The Highlands with views of the Arapahoe National Forest. It’s only a few miles from Main Street and the gondola and just steps from hiking and biking trails, and with private seasonal shuttle service, exploring the area is a breeze.

In the summer, watch the stars appear over the mountains from a beautifully appointed stone patio with a barbecue, outdoor fireplace and al-fresco dining for eight. When there’s snow on the peaks, finish the day with a soak in the private outdoor hot tub or relax indoors in a lower-level entertainment area with a wet bar and kitchenette.

Warm, welcoming interiors designed by Suzanne Allen Guerra feature custom finishes and inviting open-concept layouts. The heart of the home is an expansive great room anchored by a stone fireplace and cozy sitting area at one end and a fully equipped kitchen at the other. In between, vaulted beamed ceilings and hardwood floors are the backdrop for a dining area that seats ten.

This luxury vacation rental has three bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms: two with queen beds and fireplaces, and one with two twin-over-queen bunk beds. The other two bedrooms have a queen bed and a queen bunk bed, respectively, and share a hall bathroom. Together, the five bedrooms can accommodate up to sixteen friends and family members.

Whether you want a laid-back honeymoon from real life or an active Colorado adventure, Highlands Hideaway delivers. Spend your stay spotting the birds and foxes in the forest around the villa, or take advantage of nearby golf, hiking, biking and cultural activities like the Breckenridge Oktoberfest. Skiers will appreciate easy access to the BreckConnect gondola and Copper Mountain, while younger guests won’t want to miss out on sledding and tubing at the town’s Carter Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Listen to the hush that settles over the mountains while the snow falls at Chalet Tarentaise. Nicknamed “the birdhouse” for its unique shape and hillside perch, this contemporary Colorado vacation rental affords 270-degree views that sweep from the valley to the ski slopes. It’s tucked into a quiet neighborhood so you can enjoy the scenery in peace, but is only a short drive from the skiing, dining, shopping and more in central Steamboat Springs.

Winter stays at the chalet include shuttle service and continental breakfast. The villa’s deck features a private hot tub where you can watch the stars or the latest snowfall. (For summer visitors, there’s also a barbecue.) Entertaining indoors is a snap thanks to a TV, fireplace and Wi-Fi, while a ski storage area and boot dryers ensure everyone’s convenience and comfort.

Behind the unusual façade of this luxury villa, you’ll find a classic great room with an open-plan living area, dining area and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. Wood floors and a stone fireplace surround lend natural texture to the space, while leather sofas and dining chairs tie the different areas together.

The four bedrooms at Chalet Tarentaise can accommodate up to ten guests—enough room for an extended family or a holiday shared by several couples. There are two bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms: a master suite with a king bed and a second bedroom with a queen bed. The other two bedrooms share a bathroom and have a queen bed and a king bed (or two twin beds), respectively.

During ski season, the complimentary shuttle will take you the 5 minutes to Steamboat Ski Resort or make the 8-minute drive to the nearest grocery store. In the summer, it’s an easy 9 minutes to the scenic Rollingstone Ranch golf course. No matter what time of year you visit, be sure to spend an afternoon splashing in the pools at Steamboat Springs Old Town or a honeymoon-worthy evening soaking underneath the stars at Strawberry Park’s hot springs.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
